description: Input text component which can be used for taking user inputs

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: value which needs to be set to the input

inputs.name: required
inputs.description: Defines whether the input is reauired or not. If true, Shows an indicator beside the label indicating it is an required property

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: tells whether the input control is disabled

inputs.name: readonly
inputs.description: tells whether user can edit or only read the value

inputs.name: inputConfig
inputs.description: Defines the configurations for input element

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description: Hint for autofill feature. Supports only the autocomplete values of native input element.

inputs.name: clear
inputs.description: shows a clear icon beside the input field, on the right side, to clear input

inputs.name: uiConfig
inputs.description: Defines ui configurations for mat form field

properties.name: hideRequiredMarker
properties.description: if true hides the * mark beside the label for required properties

properties.name: formFieldAppearance
properties.description: defines the appearance of the mat form field.

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.description: prefixes content to the input field

properties.name: iconName
properties.description: name of the icon which needs to be prefixed

properties.name: text
properties.description: content which needs to be prefixed

inputs.name: suffix
inputs.description: suffixes content to the input field

properties.name: iconName
properties.description: name of the icon which needs to be prefixed

properties.name: text
properties.description: content which needs to be prefixed
